p: Opioid misuse has been linked to poor adherence to cART (Jeevanjee et al. 2014). However, adherence to ARV therapy improves after initiation of opioid substitution therapy (Nosyk et al. 2015; Low et al. 2016; Adams et al. 2020). Although better adherence can improve therapeutic outcomes in PWH, little information is currently available on the interaction between opioids or opioid substitution therapies and cART specifically within the CNS.
